sentences.en: a restaurant that prides itself on speed of service
sentences.cn: 以服务速度为骄傲的餐馆

sentences.en: Alik's words filled her heart with pride.
sentences.cn: 亚利克的话让她心感自豪。

sentences.en: Davis had to salvage his pride.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯必须得挽回他的自尊。

sentences.en: Even the poor have their pride.
sentences.cn: 即使穷人也有自尊。

sentences.en: He felt a glow of pride in what she had accomplished.
sentences.cn: 他为她取得的成绩深感自豪。

sentences.en: He wore his medals with pride.
sentences.cn: 他自豪地戴着奖章。

sentences.en: His heart swelled with pride when his daughter came in.
sentences.cn: 女儿进来时他的内心充满了自豪感。

sentences.en: His pride may still be his downfall.
sentences.cn: 他的傲慢可能还会毁了他。

sentences.en: It was a severe blow to Kendall's pride.
sentences.cn: 这严重地打击了肯德尔的自尊心。

sentences.en: She could see her two sons swell with pride.
sentences.cn: 她能看出她的两个儿子充满了骄傲。

sentences.en: She felt a glow of pride when her name was announced for the prize.
sentences.cn: 宣布她获奖时她感到非常自豪。

sentences.en: She prides herself on being a good listener.
sentences.cn: 她为自己善于倾听而感到自豪。

sentences.en: She will probably take great pride in wearing school uniform.
sentences.cn: 她大概会为穿上校服而感到非常得意。

sentences.en: Success in sport is a source of national pride .
sentences.cn: 体育方面的成就可以激发民族自豪感。

sentences.en: Take pride in your health and your figure.
sentences.cn: 为自己的健康和体形感到骄傲吧。

sentences.en: the car was his pride and joy.
sentences.cn: 那部车是他最得意的东西。

sentences.en: the certificate has pride of place on my wall.
sentences.cn: 那张证书占着我墙上最醒目的位置。

sentences.en: The expectant mothers that Amy had encountered positively glowed with pride.
sentences.cn: 埃米遇见的准妈妈们个个洋溢着自豪和喜悦。

sentences.en: The manifesto gives pride of place to job creation.
sentences.cn: 这项宣言将创造工作机会放在首位。

sentences.en: The people have a sense of pride in their community.
sentences.cn: 人们对自己的社区有一种自豪感。

sentences.en: The town takes immense pride in recent achievements.
sentences.cn: 全镇人对近来取得的成就都感到非常自豪。

sentences.en: They can look back on their endeavours with pride.
sentences.cn: 他们可以骄傲地回首过去付出的努力。

sentences.en: They carried themselves with great pride and dignity.
sentences.cn: 他们举手投足间透着傲气和高贵。

sentences.en: We definitely wanted to salvage some pride for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 我们当然想为英国网球挽回一些尊严。

phrases.tran_cn: 处于…的顶峰(或最佳状态)

phrases.phrase: pride goes (或 comes) before a fall

phrases.tran_cn: [古语]排场;虚荣[亦作 pride of the world]
最醒目的位置；最重要的地位
清晨的薄雾和阵雨(天晴的预兆)

trans.tran_cn: 自豪，值得骄傲的人/物，尊严，自负，狮群
trans.tran_en: a feeling that you are proud of something that you or someone connected with you has achieved
to be especially proud of something that you do well, or of a good quality that you have
